MemoryInfobox.description: 'An rich, ostracized Athens|Athenian found Davos|himself in Kephallonia - dirty, bandit-ridden Kephallonia. His Orneos|brother was also sent along, but not without bandits stealing all his drachmae.'

General_Description: '''A Ship Came Sailing''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: While in the [[Pronnoi Peninsula]], Kassandra came across a [[Davos|man]] near [[Kleptous Bay]].
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra approached the man on the hill near Kleptous Bay. *'''Davos:''' ''Ah, misthios! You must help me.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''Must I?'' *'''Davos:''' ''If you know what's good for you and your purse, you'll take pause.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm listening.'' *'''Davos:''' ''I'm am exile from [[Athens]]... Though by looking at me, I'm sure that's impossible to believe.'' |-|You do look rich.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''A successful exile, at least. Who should offer enough to keep me interested.'' *'''Davos:''' ''You have a good eye.'' |-|How humble.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''I see humility's important to you.'' *'''Davos:''' ''When you're wealthy, you can afford to be proud.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''We'll see how that works in convincing me to do what you need.'' *'''Davos:''' ''My [[drachma]]e speak for themselves.'' |-|Wealth is dangerous in Kephallonia.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''Your money's a siren song to bandits on [[Kephallonia]]. It won't last long.'' *'''Davos:''' ''My drachmae aren't going anywhere... Except a portion will be paid to you if you agree to my terms.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''What's the problem?'' *'''Davos:''' ''It's my brother [[Orneos]]. He's been captured by bandits! We were attacked when our ship landed. They must have smelled our wealth from across the water. I managed to escape, but he's stuck in a cage on the dock like a beast!'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''And you want me to rescue him.'' *'''Davos:''' ''Bring him to me with not a hair on his head disturbed, and I'll pay you well.'' [[File:ACOD_-_A_Ship_Came_Sailing.png|thumb|240px]] (If players choose "Why were you exiled?") *'''Kassandra:''' ''So someone in Athens wanted you out.'' *'''Davos:''' ''Many "someones," actually. Ostracized for the same thing, Ornes and I. "Fraud" they called it! But that's life, isn't it? You're used to that, aren't you misthios?'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''What?'' *'''Davos:''' ''A [[mercenary]]'s life isn't an honest one, of course. But don't worry! Your secret's safe with me.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'd watch your tongue, old man.
I'll rescue your brother. For a price.'' *'''Davos:''' ''Yes yes, of course, drachmae is the only language you Kephallonians understand.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm not Kephallonian.'' Kassandra head down the hill to the docks, which had been overran with bandits. After eliminating the bandits, Kassandra approached a small cage, where a man was held in. *'''Civilian:''' ''Release me! I am not an animal!'' Kassandra freed the man, and escorted him back to Davos. *'''Civilian:''' ''How dare they lay their filthy hands on me! And you, here, a drachma for your efforts. Although you could have arrived sooner.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''Your brother sent me.'' *'''Civilian:''' ''I knew he'd rescue me! And how quickly he's found himself a lackey.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''To be clear, I'm the one rescuing you, and if it wasn't for your brother's money I'd gladly feed you to the pigs. Now let's go. Stay close, and shut up.'' |-|They returned to Davos. If the box near the Orneos/civilian cage has not been looted.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''I see humility's important to you.'' *'''Davos:''' ''Orneos! Reunited again!'' *'''Civilian:''' ''I don't know where you find these ruffians, brother, but they do get the job done.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''This is touching, but you owe me drachmae.'' *'''Davos:''' ''You proved yourself useful. Get yourself something nice.'' |-|If the box near the Orneos/civilian cage been looted first.= *'''Civilian:''' ''Don't think I didn't notice you looting one of my chest'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''Consider it a fee for you hubris, Malaka.'' *'''Davos:''' ''Oh, she did bring you to me, Orneas. Let her go.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''As quickly as I can.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra helped Davos to rescue his brother from the bandits.
Section_Trivia: *If the box near the Orneos/civilian cage been looted yet the area activities are not done, the quest item "Brother's Riches" will remain in your inventory, also if the notification marker is not remove within the inventory of said quest item, it will indefinitely remain in your inventory even after the quest A Ship Came Sailing is done. The description for the item is "''It's rather lucky the pompous brothers brought their riches to khepholonia - Lucky for you, that is.''"
